name: Food Pantry
description: Our Lady of Lourdes is a food pantry. ID and proof of address required. Bring a bag. Food pantry service hours: Line up Sat 8:30am for ticket for food given out 9:30am-11:30am.. . Make sure you check by calling the food pantry to confirm that they still are in operation and the hours have not changed

whatTheyOffer: Our Lady of Lourdes is a food pantry. ID and proof of address required. Bring a bag. Food pantry service hours: Line up Sat 8:30am for ticket for food given out 9:30am-11:30am.. . Make sure you check by calling the food pantry to confirm that they still are in operation and the hours have not changed
howToGetIt: Bring a photo ID & proof of SF address during the hours listed. SF-Marin Food Bank will process your enrollment and confirm through mail where you will pick up food weekly. For list of all pantries, please visit Food Locator at "sfmfoodbank.org/find-food".
